评论详情: This jacket feels nice and meets the description, but it's either got a bit of a crop cut or the plus sizes aren't made any longer than the regular sizes. I'm 5'4" and about 305lbs and it sits much higher on my torso than I would like.
The product came in a bright red color. It’s not the same as the picture.
Very warm and cozy. I got the green color. Size medium and iam about 140lb

评论概述: Runs big in the arms but great material, comfy and warm
评论详情: I really wanted to keep this but I had to return because it was too large in the arms. I am 5' and 115 lbs and I ordered a small. Material was great, comfortable and warm!
I love everything about this hoodie! The red is gorgeous, not a color I normally would order, but I’m so glad I did. The fit is true to size, so if you’re looking for oversized, definitely size up.

评论用户: Better quality that expected. Very happy with it. Actually when others seen it at Christmas they went right online and ordered! Got 4 sales off this one!!

评论详情: Great product for the price, comfortable, oversized, mid-weight material. I’m happy with this purchase.
I love this sweater, it’s slightly baggy, I am 5’8 150lbs and got a large, it fits perfect for me. And it’s actually really warm.
This is extremely well-made and I love that it has a zipper makes it easier for not messing up your hair. It is thick and warm. It is true to size and color is as pictured.
It's a perfect fit and I like how the material feels.  The color is as shown and material is just right not too thick nor too thin. I have a medium,  I'm a 38DD.
Do not waste your money on this hoodie.  After the first wash on gentle it already looks ratty and cheap due to the excessive pilling.  Poor quality fabric.
Item as described. Color is pretty. Sizing is off. Not true to size. Usually 2x is more than big enough. Not for this. Order size up. Need to return.
